alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:53AM AKST until February 16 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING FOR THE COPPER RIVER BASIN NORTH OF GLENNALLEN... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches with locally higher amounts of up to 12 inches. * WHERE...Copper River Basin north of Glennallen. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread in across the Copper River Basin from southwest to northeast. The greatest snowfall totals are expected from the junction of the Richardson Highway and Tok Cutoff northward, including Paxson.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
